intents.description: Analyze NPS by region to understand regional satisfaction differences
Compare overall satisfaction across different subscription plans to identify which plan users are most satisfied
Analyze correlation between feature usage and overall satisfaction to identify features that drive satisfaction
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand loyalty patterns
Identify at-risk customers based on low NPS and low purchase intent to target retention strategies

rationale: The analysis plan aims to provide actionable insights into customer satisfaction and retention by examining key metrics such as NPS, overall satisfaction, and feature usage. By segmenting customers based on demographics, subscription plans, and usage patterns, we can identify areas for improvement and tailor strategies to enhance customer experience and reduce churn risk. This analysis will support strategic decisions for product development and marketing initiatives.
